@package engine-io-growler
@version 0.1.0.1

module Network.EngineIO.Growler
growlerAPI :: MonadIO m => ServerAPI (HandlerT m)

module Network.SocketIO.Growler
initializeSocketIO :: MonadIO m => StateT RoutingTable (ReaderT Socket (HandlerT m)) a -> IO (HandlerT m ())
socketIOHandler :: MonadIO m => HandlerT m () -> GrowlerT m ()
